title: The Discovery Leisure Company and Citi Card Offers Exclusive Travel Deals
text:
The Discovery Leisure Company and Citi Card Offers Exclusive Travel Deals
Plan your next getaway with Citi Card and The Discovery Leisure Company, a luxury hotel group in the Philippines, and enjoy luxurious vacations at great discounts.
Pasig City, Philippines, August 30, 2015 --( PR.com )-- With Citi’s 25th anniversary, creating wonderful memories with loved ones has never been so easy. To mark this milestone, Citi Card, the country’s leading foreign bank, in partnership with The Discovery Leisure Company (TDLCI), a homegrown Filipino luxury hotel group, launches excellent deals for travels until December 2015. Experience a splendid vacation in any of the five different local destinations and enjoy great discounts. Choose to go to Boracay, Palawan, Tagaytay or posh city destinations such as Makati and Ortigas. Have up to 60% discounts on these vacation deals by simply using a Citi credit card to book at any TDLCI hotels or resorts.
“Filipinos love to travel—whether it’s a quick weekend getaway to a nearby beach, an extended holiday in one of the finest islands in the country, or even just a day tour in an unfamiliar part of the city -- the trip won’t be remarkable without having fun and pampering themselves in an unforgettable place that gives them a feeling of luxury,” shares David Stoughton, Credit Payment Products Director for Citi. “That’s why we teamed up with The Discovery Leisure Company to provide our cardholders with unique vacation experiences in their posh hotels and resorts,” he adds.
The Discovery Leisure Company is a Filipino hospitality group that owns and manages a collection of award-winning hotels and resorts in top vacation destinations around the country. With bookings available until 30 September 2015 and stays valid until 30 December 2015, Citi cardholders can enjoy these fabulous offers:
50% discount on a 3-day, 2-night stay in a Junior Suite at Discovery Shores Boracay inclusive of buffet breakfast for two and roundtrip transfers from and to Caticlan airport.
55% discount on a 2-night stay in a Garden Suite at Club Paradise Palawan inclusive of buffet breakfast for two and roundtrip transfers from and to Busuanga airport.
60% discount on an overnight stay in a Deluxe Suite at Discovery Country Suites Tagaytay inclusive of breakfast for two at Restaurant Verbena with wine and cheese pairing at sundown.
50% on an overnight stay in a Junior Suite at Discovery Suites Ortigas inclusive of a buffet breakfast for two at Restaurant 5.
Introductory offer for an overnight stay in a Business Flat at Discovery Primea Makati inclusive of gourmet breakfast for two at Restaurant Tapenade. Discovery Primea, the newest luxury hotel in Makati, owned and managed by TDLCI was designed by world-renowned architect, Kenzo Tange. The 68-storey skyscraper features classic Mediterranean Chinoiserie-inspired aesthetics designed to be timeless but up-to-date with modern amenities.
The deals get even better as Citi and TDLCI extend these amazing offers for travels in 2016. Book any TDLCI hotel or resort using a Citi credit card from 1 October to 30 December 2015 and get the same deals for stays valid from January to June 2016. Terms and conditions apply.
“We are very happy to collaborate with Citi in providing their cardholders with wonderful vacation experiences they can share with their loved ones. This partnership gives us the opportunity to give them a taste of our distinct top-of-the-line service and heartfelt Filipino hospitality that no other hotels and resorts can offer,” says Odette Huang, Group Director for Sales and Marketing of The Discovery Leisure Company.
To know more about these exciting destinations, please go to http://www.discoveryhotels-resorts.com.
For more information on these exclusive offers, please go to http://www.mydiscovery.ph/citi25
About The Discovery Leisure Company, Inc
The Discovery Leisure Company, Inc. is a Filipino hospitality group that owns and manages a collection of hotels and resorts in exquisite locations around the Philippines. Its distinctive destinations inspire authentic experiences for every traveler, from Discovery Suites Ortigas, Discovery Country Suites Tagaytay, Discovery Shores Boracay, Club Paradise in Coron, Palawan, to the newly-opened Discovery Primea Makati.
The Discovery Leisure Company, Inc.’s portfolio of award-winning properties is known worldwide for its signature Filipino hospitality, marked by genuine and personalized “Service That’s All Heart.”
About Citi
Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
